ygData.subject: Re: Smithing Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: move to halas or qeynos or erudin and sell some ... Here
ygData.messageBody:
move to halas or qeynos or erudin and sell some

At 01:25 PM 7/9/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: Libertn2@...
>
>On the Karana Server, prices have hit the floor. The following is what I
>sell at (and I have stock in my bank that has been there for weeks):
>
>bracers, gorgets, helms, boots, arms, masks, belts - 5p
>mantles and cloaks 10p
>tunic and legs - 13p
>
>Now this is rediculous but I have masks, arms and mantles in the bank that I
>cant get rid of at these prices. Go figure. (smithing skill 135).
>
>Hawkwin of Hawkwin's Roaming Emporium
